synthesis_conditions.washing_method: filtered through Celite®, diluted with AcOEt (200 mL) and washed with water
synthesis_conditions.drying_method: dried over Na2SO4, filtered and evaporated under reduced pressure

additional_steps.step_description: Purification by column chromatography (SiO2, AcOEt/n-hexane with the ratio changing from 3 to 6%)

synthesis_conditions.washing_method: washed with DMF (50 mL, 3 times) and methanol (50 mL, 1 time)

additional_steps.step_description: Solvent exchange with methanol at 60 °C for 3 days, every 24 h the methanol was replaced by new one
Dried under vacuum at 60 °C for 3 h
Activated again in-situ on BELmax or BEL18 gas sorption apparatuses at 120 °C for 2 h

synthesis_conditions.equipment: BELSORP-max or BELSORP-18PLUS automated volumetric sorption analysers

additional_steps.step_description: Adsorption rate measured and fitted automatically with BEL-Dyna software according to the Crank theory
